20101224073834.000|20101224073836.000|CC1|TRANSLATED INTO ENGLISH.        
20101224073836.000|20101224073837.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BRENT LAND DRAW

20101224073848.000|20101224073851.000|CC1|>> IT'S AN INCREDIBLY GRAND

20101224073856.000|20101224073859.000|CC1|OF ADAM AND EVE'S THIRD SON,    
20101224073859.000|20101224073900.000|CC1|SETH.

20101224073905.000|20101224073908.000|CC1|SHIR, AND FROM OTHER ANCIENT    
20101224073908.000|20101224073910.000|CC1|TEXTS, SEEMS LIKE THE PLACE HAD 
20101224073910.000|20101224073912.000|CC1|IN MIND IS THE LAND OF CHINA.

20101224073922.000|20101224073923.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE STAR COMES.    
20101224073923.000|20101224073926.000|CC1|AND IT LEADS THEM, OF COURSE, TO
20101224073926.000|20101224073928.000|CC1|BETHLEHEM AND SO THAT'S WHERE WE
20101224073928.000|20101224073928.000|CC1|WENT.

20101224074019.000|20101224074022.000|CC1|JUST LIKE THE MAGI IN MATTHEW'S 
20101224074022.000|20101224074022.000|CC1|GOSPEL.                         
20101224074022.000|20101224074024.000|CC1|IN BIBLICAL TIMES, TRAVELERS

20101224074025.000|20101224074028.000|CC1|TO BETHLEHEM OVER THE DRY HILLS.
20101224074028.000|20101224074031.000|CC1|AND EVEN TODAY, 2,000 YEARS     
20101224074031.000|20101224074034.000|CC1|LATER, IT'S EASY TO IMAGINE     
20101224074034.000|20101224074037.000|CC1|THEM, THE CARAVANS COMING UP THE
20101224074037.000|20101224074039.000|CC1|RIDGELINE OVER THAT LONG, HARD  
20101224074039.000|20101224074040.000|CC1|JOURNEY THAT MAY HAVE TAKEN     
20101224074040.000|20101224074041.000|CC1|MONTHS OR YEARS.                
20101224074041.000|20101224074042.000|CC1|SO, LET'S TALK ABOUT THE EAST.  
20101224074042.000|20101224074044.000|CC1|AT THE TIME OF THE BIRTH OF     
20101224074044.000|20101224074045.000|CC1|JESUS, WHO COULD HAVE CROSSED   
20101224074045.000|20101224074046.000|CC1|THIS DESERT?

20101224074051.000|20101224074053.000|CC1|MEN, THE MAGI, DID?             
20101224074053.000|20101224074053.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101224074053.000|20101224074056.000|CC1|THERE ARE ROADS WHICH LEAD UP TO
20101224074056.000|20101224074059.000|CC1|BETHLEHEM, ESPECIALLY FROM THE  
20101224074059.000|20101224074100.000|CC1|SOUTHEAST.                      
20101224074100.000|20101224074102.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HELPING US MAP THIS
20101224074102.000|20101224074105.000|CC1|ANCIENT ROUTE, SHIMON GIBSON,   
20101224074105.000|20101224074107.000|CC1|AUTHOR OF SEVERAL BOOKS,        
20101224074107.000|20101224074109.000|CC1|INCLUDING "THE FINAL DAYS OF    
20101224074109.000|20101224074111.000|CC1|JESUS," THE ARCHAEOLOGICAL

20101224074115.000|20101224074118.000|CC1|CHINA AND IT'S CALLED A SPICE

20101224074120.000|20101224074122.000|CC1|MOMENT, WE'RE NEXT TO ONE OF

20101224074151.000|20101224074152.000|CC1|BETHLEH

20101224074154.000|20101224074155.000|CC1|IMPOSSIBILITY.                  
20101224074155.000|20101224074156.000|CC1|BUT THERE IS A TRADITION THERE, 
20101224074156.000|20101224074158.000|CC1|WHICH IS LINKED TO IT.          
20101224074158.000|20101224074159.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SCHOLARS DEBATE THE
20101224074159.000|20101224074201.000|CC1|HISTORICAL REALITY OF THE MAGI  
20101224074201.000|20101224074203.000|CC1|STORY, BUT THE MEANING OF THEIR 
20101224074203.000|20101224074205.000|CC1|MIRACULOUS JOURNEY HAS BEEN PART
20101224074205.000|20101224074207.000|CC1|OF CHRISTIAN WORSHIP FROM THE   
20101224074207.000|20101224074207.000|CC1|VERY BEGINNING.                 
20101224074207.000|20101224074209.000|CC1|>> THIS IS THE KIND OF A STORY  
20101224074209.000|20101224074211.000|CC1|THAT IS EVOCATIVE ENOUGH,       
20101224074211.000|20101224074212.000|CC1|MYSTERIOUS ENOUGH, MAGICAL      
20101224074212.000|20101224074215.000|CC1|ENOUGH, IF YOU WILL, AND        
20101224074215.000|20101224074219.000|CC1|HISTORICAL ENOUGH TO GROUND DOWN
20101224074219.000|20101224074221.000|CC1|INTO, TO BE ROOTED IN, TO SEE   
20101224074221.000|20101224074224.000|CC1|OURSELVES IN, EITHER AS GIVER OR
20101224074224.000|20101224074226.000|CC1|RECIPIENT, FOR INSTANCE.        
20101224074226.000|20101224074230.000|CC1|AND AT THE SAME TIME, TO WANT TO
20101224074230.000|20101224074231.000|CC1|MAKE OTHE STORY OUR OWN.        
20101224074231.000|20101224074233.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THAT'S EXACTLY WHAT
20101224074233.000|20101224074236.000|CC1|AN UNKNOWN WRITER DID 1700 YEARS
20101224074236.000|20101224074238.000|CC1|AGO IN "THE REVELATION OF THE   
20101224074238.000|20101224074239.000|CC1|MAGI."                          
20101224074239.000|20101224074241.000|CC1|IT'S AN ANCIENT TEXT.           
20101224074241.000|20101224074243.000|CC1|>> YES, ABSOLUTELY.
